seo.title: Broadsign Connect Summit 2025
seo.description: Join us in Barcelona for the annual Broadsign Connect Summit 2025. Get ready to uncover key insights and access powerful tools to drive your business forward while making meaningful connections with fellow industry experts.

hero.title: Broadsign Connect Summit 2025
hero.par: Our customer summit might be over, but you can still watch the keynote sessions on demand. Enjoy!

featuredVideo.title: See the highlights from our 2025 Customer Summit in Barcelona, Spain!

videos.title: Driving OOH Growth with Measurement
videos.description: Deeper data insights and attribution capabilities are helping advertisers better understand OOH performance. Learn practical strategies to leverage these advancements, proving the value of OOH to attract larger advertising budgets and secure your spot in multi-channel campaigns.

videos.title: Unlocking the Power of Automation
videos.description: Be among the first to experience our newest innovation, set to transform how OOH advertising is bought and sold. Watch for an exclusive look at our latest platform update—the first of its kind—designed to put automation at the heart of OOH transactions.

videos.title: Sustainability on Screen
videos.description: Sustainability is taking center stage in the advertising landscape. Discover how Scope 3's carbon measurement tools help media owners like you meet environmental goals, tap into green media budgets, and add compelling value to your offerings.

videos.title: The Platform that Powers OOH
videos.description: Join our product leaders as they unveil the 2025 roadmap, providing a clear view of what's coming to the platform this year.

videos.title: State of the Industry
videos.description: Vincent draws on his extensive experience in the advertising industry to explore key market insights and EMEA emerging trends shaping 2025.

presenters.name: Vincent Létang
presenters.position: EVP, Managing Partner, Global Market Intelligence, MAGNA
